alert.note: Alert for Jones; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 8:12PM CDT until May 07 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Jones County in west central Texas... Northwestern Taylor County in west central Texas... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 812 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Merkel, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Tye, Dyess Afb and View around 820 PM CDT. Caps around 825 PM CDT. Wylie around 830 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 261 and 283. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
